about_the_game:
If you've always dreamed of burning that ugly sweater from grandma, today's your day!

Under the watchful eye of the workshop manager - a.k.a. Santa Claus - your mission is simple: turn the camera around the chimney and watch your pile of gifts turn into sparkling ashes!


Choose from 3 types of fuel from the option menu: elegant wood logs, beautifully wrapped gifts or a random mix from the elves' workshop...
You might be surprised what's there!


Santa always delivers new gifts to refill the fire, but sometimes he just goes crazy over quantity.
It's possible that all those gifts will make the fireplace overflow! Watch out for the wooden floor and your nose hairs.
Take a look at the burn counter and share your record with us!

Snuggle up under your warm blanket, enjoy the hypnotic dance of the fire and let the magic of Unwanted Xmas Gift Burning Simulator work its charm.

Merry Xmas and happy burning!


Take a screenshot with [CTRL+S] and share your best moments with your friends!
Adjust audio settings, fuel type and window size from the game menu with [TAB].

Keymap list:

  • [LEFTCLICK] - Grab and drop

  • [RIGHTCLICK] - Throw

  • [SPACEBAR] - Zoom In/Out

  • [ESCAPE], [TAB], [-P] - Toggle Main Menu

  • [MOUSE] - Rotate camera

  • [CTRL+S] - Grab screenshot

  • [ALT+ENTER] - Toggle Fullscreen & Windowed mode
